timeline.message: fix(TDI-43295): Support Oracle 19c in Studio DI
fix(TDI-43295): Support Oracle 19c in Studio DI

timeline.bodyText: Need to recheck if default value should be changed
timeline.author: gonchar-ivan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -57,8 +57,9 @@
     </PARAMETER>
 	<PARAMETER NAME="DB_VERSION" FIELD="CLOSED_LIST" NUM_ROW="25"
 		REPOSITORY_VALUE="DB_VERSION">
-		<ITEMS DEFAULT="ORACLE_18">
-			<ITEM NAME="ORACLE_18" VALUE="ORACLE_18" />
+		<ITEMS DEFAULT="ORACLE_19">

replies.bodyText: Rechecked. The latest driver should be suggested as default
replies.author: gonchar-ivan

timeline.bodyText:
I would suggest to use the same name pattern here as for other imports: Driver-Ojdbc8
(suggested name: Driver-Ojdbc8-19)
Another thought - maybe we should not to add, but replace previous version of Driver-Ojdbc8?
timeline.author: gonchar-ivan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -240,6 +241,7 @@
    <CODEGENERATION>
     <IMPORTS>
        <IMPORT NAME="TNS" MODULE="tns.jar" MVN="mvn:org.talend.libraries/tns/6.0.0"  REQUIRED="true" />
+       <IMPORT NAME="ORACLE_19"     MODULE="ojdbc8-19.3.0.0.jar" MVN="mvn:com.oracle.ojdbc/ojdbc8/19.3.0.0" REQUIRED_IF="(DB_VERSION == 'ORACLE_19')" />

replies.bodyText:
I didn't find where NAME attribute is used in Studio (didn't find if it is displayed somewhere)
So, I'm ok to leave NAME as is
replies.author: gonchar-ivan

timeline.bodyText:
Should we notify i18n team somehow about new i18n key-value?
If latest driver supports Oracle 18, maybe we need to to modify existing key to "Oracle 18-19"?
timeline.author: gonchar-ivan

replies.bodyText: Discussed. Need to wait for Wang Wei to check if there are some blockers to merge Oracle 18 and Oracle 19 options to "Oracle 18 and above"
replies.author: gonchar-ivan

timeline.bodyText: Not sure we need to modify properties files for other languages. Seems, these files should be exported from babili, when i18n team does translation on their side
timeline.author: gonchar-ivan

timeline.bodyText: please, do not mofify properties files for languages. Nicolas will do babili export to include translated changes
timeline.author: gonchar-ivan

timeline.message: fix(TDI-43295): Support Oracle 19c in Studio DI. Revert messages for different languages
fix(TDI-43295): Support Oracle 19c in Studio DI. move from 'oracle 19' to 'oracle 18 and above'

timeline.bodyText:
maybe need to change this comment too )
compatible with ORACLE 18 and ORACLE 19
timeline.author: gonchar-ivan

timeline.message: fix(TDI-43295): Support Oracle 19c in Studio DI. move from 'oracle 19' to 'oracle 18 and above'
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/Talend/tdi-studio-se into sbovsunovskyi/TDI-43295_SupportOracle19
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/Talend/tdi-studio-se into sbovsunovskyi/TDI-43295_SupportOracle19
